install:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Update system packages
sudo apt-get update

# Install Flutter dependencies
sudo apt-get install -y curl git unzip xz-utils zip libglu1-mesa wget

# Install Flutter if not already installed
if [ ! -d "$HOME/flutter" ]; then
  echo "Installing Flutter..."
  cd $HOME
  git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1
  echo 'export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc
  export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"
else
  echo "Flutter already installed"
  export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"
fi

# Configure Flutter
flutter config --no-analytics
flutter doctor -v
flutter precache --web

# Install project dependencies
cd /home/seth/workspace/workout_app
flutter pub get

# Run build_runner if available
dart run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs || echo "No build_runner found, skipping..."

# Make scripts executable
chmod +x scripts/*.sh || echo "No scripts found, skipping..."

echo "Flutter environment setup complete!"

terminals.name: Flutter Web Dev
terminals.command: export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH" && cd /home/seth/workspace/workout_app && flutter run -d web-server --web-port 8080 --web-hostname 0.0.0.0
